individual_analyses.prompt: Get the latest Python documentation from the official website
individual_analyses.issue_analysis: Prompt contains 'documentation' keyword, causing confusion with documentation intent
individual_analyses.suggested_fix: Strengthen web_research prompt template to prioritize external source indicators (website, fetch, get from) over content type

individual_analyses.prompt: Fetch API information from external sources and libraries
individual_analyses.issue_analysis: External source indicators not strong enough in prompt template
individual_analyses.suggested_fix: Add explicit 'external source' vs 'internal doc creation' distinction in prompt template

individual_analyses.prompt: Execute all unit tests and report any failures
individual_analyses.issue_analysis: 'Report' keyword associated with analysis rather than execution output
individual_analyses.suggested_fix: Clarify in tool_execution template that execution includes reporting results, not just analysis

individual_analyses.prompt: Test this function with various input values
individual_analyses.issue_analysis: 'Test function' phrase interpreted as code analysis rather than test execution
individual_analyses.suggested_fix: Add specific execution keywords (run, execute, perform) to tool_execution template to distinguish from analysis

individual_analyses.prompt: Find and fix performance issues in the code
individual_analyses.issue_analysis: 'Find and fix' interpreted as analysis first, missing the editing action
individual_analyses.suggested_fix: Update code_editing template to emphasize that 'fix' implies modification action, not just identification

web_research \u2192 documentation.root_cause: Content type keywords (documentation, API) override source location keywords (website, external)

tool_execution \u2192 code_analysis.root_cause: Analysis verbs (test, report) interpreted as passive observation rather than active execution

code_editing \u2192 code_analysis.root_cause: Multi-step actions (find and fix) prioritize discovery phase over modification phase
